analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i lugs su 'byung ba dang / rgyu la dmigs pa khong du chud pa dang / rtag pa ma yin pa dang / chad pa ma yin pa dang / mthar lta ba dang bral ba dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa dang / bdag ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang / @29b gdod ma nas ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la yid ches pa dang / smon pa med pa la som nyi med pa dang /

original: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la de kho na'i blo dang ldan pa dang / shin tu mi rtag pa nyid dang / gzugs dbu ba dang mtshungs pa nyid dang / tshor ba chu bur dang 'dra ba nyid dang / 'du shes smig rgyu dang mtshungs te gnyis su med pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la de kho na'i blo dang ldan pa dang / shin tu mi rtag pa nyid dang / gzugs dbu ba dang mtshungs pa nyid dang / tshor ba chu bur dang 'dra ba nyid dang / 'du shes smig rgyu dang mtshungs te gnyis su med pa nyid dang /
translated: It is to have the mind of suchness about the absence of conditioning. It is to have a deep understanding of impermanence. It is to understand that form is like foam. original: 'du byed rnams la chu shing dang mtshungs par so sor rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid dang / khams rnams g-yo ba med pa nyid dang / skye mched rnams phan tshun du shes pa med pa nyid dang /

translated: They are to discern that formations are like plantain trees, and that consciousness is an illusion. They are to understand that the elements are unmoving, and that the sense sources are mutually unknown.

original: sems gnas pa med pa dang / nga rgyal yid la mi byed pa dang / lhag par byed pa lhag par mi byed pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / tha dad du bya ba med pa dang / ro gcig pa dang /
analyzed: sems gnas pa med pa dang / nga rgyal yid la mi byed pa dang / lhag par byed pa lhag par mi byed pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / tha dad du bya ba med pa dang / ro gcig pa dang /
translated: They are to understand that the mind is unmoving, to not engage in pride, to not engage in special activities, to realize that sameness is sameness, to not make distinctions, and to have one taste.

original: bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam la rab tu gnas pa dang / lam gyi tshogs shes pa yongs su tshol ba dang / ngas pa'i don gyi don la rton pa dang / don gyi rjes su zhugs pa'i blo dang / skad thams cad la skad med par 'jug pa dang /

translated: They are to abide on the path of the single way, to seek the knowledge of the accumulation of the path, to rely on the meaning of the intended meaning, to have a mind that engages with the meaning, to engage with all languages as being without language,üîΩand to engage with all phenomena as being without phenomena.

original: sgra thams cad la sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad par shes pa dang / don dang tshig 'bru gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa shes pas don brjod du med par rtogs pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa ngar @30a *//üîΩ'dzin pa med pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa de shin tu zad pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa sgro btags pa med pa dang / lam shes pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa dang / lus la zhugs pa'i dran pa sngon gyi mtha' dang /
analyzed: sgra thams cad la sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad par shes pa dang / don dang tshig 'bru gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa shes pas don brjod du med par rtogs pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa ngar @30a *// 'dzin pa med pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa de shin tu zad pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa sgro btags pa med pa dang / lam shes pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa dang / lus la zhugs pa'i dran pa sngon gyi mtha' dang /
translated: It is to know that all sounds are cut off from a beginning and an end. original: phyi ma'i mthar 'pho ba med pa dang / tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa skye ba dang 'jig par gnas pa dang / sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa dmigs pa la shin tu brtags pa dang / chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa chos kyi dbyings la ma yin pa dang /

translated: It is to have the mindfulness that engages with feelings and abides in arising and disintegration. It is to have the mindfulness that engages with the mind and examines the object. It is to have the mindfulness that engages with phenomena and is not the realm of phenomena.

original: yang dag par spong ba mnyam pas mnyam pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sems la dbang bsgyur bar gyur pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po chags pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dben pas nges par byung ba dang /

translated: ‚ÄúIt is to be equal through the equality of the correct exertions. It is to have mastery over the mind through the bases of miraculous power. original: dran pa'i dbang po dran pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po yid la byed pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po spros pa las shin tu 'das pa dang / dad pa'i stobs gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa'i dbang po dran pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po yid la byed pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po spros pa las shin tu 'das pa dang / dad pa'i stobs gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is to have no mindfulness through the faculty of mindfulness. It is to have no mental activity through the faculty of samƒÅdhi. It is to have gone beyond conceptual elaboration through the faculty of wisdom. It is to have no reliance on others through the power of faith.

original: brtson 'grus kyi stobs dmigs pa rtogs pa med pa dang / dran pa'i stobs nyams pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs nges par sems par gyur pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs mi 'khrugs pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi stobs dmigs pa rtogs pa med pa dang / dran pa'i stobs nyams pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs nges par sems par gyur pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs mi 'khrugs pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is to have no realization of reference points through the power of diligence. It is to be endowed with the power of mindfulness that is never lost. It is to have certainty through the power of samƒÅdhi. It is to have the concordant cause of the power of wisdom that is unshakable.üîΩ‚Äú

analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dran pa med @30b cing brjed pa med pa dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag len pa med cing 'dor ba med pa dang /
translated: The branch of enlightenment of right mindfulness is the absence of mindfulness and the absence of forgetfulness.üîΩThe branch of enlightenment of right investigation of phenomena is the engagement with the equality of all phenomena. original: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dba' rlabs med pa dang / rab tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag lus dang sems la zhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa dang /

original: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gnyis dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba lta ba thams cad spong ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /

original: yang dag pa'i ngag sgra skad thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' lus dang / sems kyi las dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba tshol ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba 'deg pa med cing 'jog pa med pa dang /

translated: It is the correct speech that engages the sameness of all sounds and voices. It is the correct action that is free from physical and mental activity. It is the correct livelihood that severs all seeking. It is the correct effort that is neither exertion nor placement.

original: yang dag pa'i dran pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam par rig pa la mi 'jug pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / zhi ba zhi gnas kyi mthar song ba dang /

translated: The meaning of primordially being unborn is the meaning of suffering.üîΩThe meaning of being without movement is the meaning of selflessness.üîΩThe meaning of complete peace is the meaning of peace.üîΩGenerosity is to be tamed.üîΩDiscipline is to be a cool entity.

original: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i snying rje dang / dga' ba med pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsom pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa'i btang snyoms dang / chos thams cad 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' nas stong pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar dben pa dang /
